overview: On their third month as a couple, Matty and Lawrence decide to test their relationship by inviting Matty’s former lover, Borg, a law graduate preparing for the bar exams, for dinner. But Borg arrives with his new lover Andrei. Midway into Matty’s sumptuous dinner, the new pairs start a game of one-upmanship. One couple will embark on an Asian cruise; the other has tickets for Beyonce’s concert. This briskly escalates into a confrontation between former lovers Matty and Borg, each one throwing accusations at the other.
title: Playmates
